item.title: HSL Color
item.author: han@d.foundation (Han Ngo)
item.description: Frontend engineers use Hexadecimal color codes to represent colors, but they have some limitations: Hexadecimal color codes are difficult to write and adjust, requiring the use of a third-party application to get right.
